# Code of Conduct

We are committed to providing a welcoming, respectful, and harassment-free experience for everyone.

## Standards
- Be respectful and inclusive.
- Assume positive intent; seek clarification before escalating.
- Provide constructive feedback focused on ideas, not individuals.

## Unacceptable Behavior
- Harassment, discrimination, or personal attacks.
- Doxxing or sharing private information.
- Sustained disruption of discussions.

## Reporting
Email: INSERT_CONTACT (replace with maintainer email). Include:
- Description of incident
- Date/time (with timezone)
- Any supporting context or links

## Enforcement
Reports are reviewed promptly. Actions may include warning, content removal, temporary or permanent ban.

## Attribution
Adapted from Contributor Covenant v2.1.
